activities: Personal Information Received from the EU: PRA Health Sciences is a clinical research organization that provides a range of research, development, and consulting services to pharmaceutical and biotech companies clients around the world.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resources data, clinical trial data, client and supplies. Includes manually processed as well as electronic data.
recoursemech: PRA's Privacy Officer receives complaints and reports of non-compliance.  Any investigations which are warranted will be conducted by PRA's Quality Assurance Department, the results of which and any recommended corrective actions will be reported to the Privacy Officer.  PRA will utilize the services of the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for dispute resolution and will cooperate and comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
